useCase.name: Request Climate Data
useCase.description: As a Level 4 projections producer, I want to request climate data from Level 2/3/4 data producer.

preconditions.precondition: Both producers are connected to the system.

successEndConditions.condition: Level 4 projections producer receives URIs for the requested data.

useCase.trigger: Level 4 projections producer asks for climate data.

mainSequence.step: Level 4 projections producer asks for aggregated time series of air temperature.
Level 4 projections producer asks for gridded historical weather observations.
Level 4 projections producer asks for climate model data.
Level 2/3/4 data producer gets URIs from Level 2/3/4 data.
Level 2/3/4 data producer gives back URIs to Level 4 projections producer.
